dcterms:creator: M. Herrero-Zazo
L. Hong
T. Zhang
dcterms:description: A manually annotated single sentence corpus consisting of 792 texts from DrugBank and 233 Medline abstracts, containing 18502 pharmacological substances and 5028 drug-drug interactions (DDIs) annotated with four relation types: mechanism, effect, advise, and int.
dcterms:title: DDIs 2013 dataset

dcterms:creator: L. Hong
dcterms:description: A dataset constructed from nearly 20 million PubMed abstracts, containing over 480k sentences labeled with six types of drug-target interactions, including substrate, inhibitor, agonist/antagonist, unknown, other, and a fake type 'NA'.
dcterms:title: DTIs Dataset
